dataList.name: Ferocious Acidic Crust
dataList.desc: When the head is broken, the part has -2 Skill Final Power

dataList.name: Stolen Rupturing Shell
dataList.desc: When the shell is broken, the part has -2 Skill Final Power

dataList.name: Emergency Nutrient Supply
dataList.desc:
After this unit defeats its ally, heal by 5% of Max PV.
At the end of the turn, if this unit has healed 15% of Max PV with the above effect, restore the shell.

dataList.name: A Crab-eat-crab World
dataList.desc:
At less than 70% PV, Brutal Pummelling, Powerful! Pummel, and Foaming skills target another ally with the least current PV.
When attacking an ally, heals PV by the damage dealt.
When defeating an ally, heals PV by double the damage dealt.

dataList.name: Looming Presence
dataList.desc: Turn Start: All enemies lose 10 PS
